_header: I command all the rattons that are here about
_description: Charm against Rats — twenty-one irregular lines

BodRawC288.First Lines:
I comawnde alle þe ratones þat are here abowteþat
                    non duelle in þis place with Inne ne with owte…
BodRawC288.Last Lines:
…god saue þis place fro alle oþer wykked
                    wytesboþe be dayes & be nytes & in nomine patris & filii
                    et cetera
BodRawC288.Note:
21 lines, mostly couplets; writing very faded; not Oxford,  Bodleian Library Rawlinson C.85 (SC 12145), as listed in Brown  and  Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown,   and  Rossell Hope Robbins.  
             The Index of Middle English Verse.
         New York: Printed for the Index Society by Columbia University Press,
            1943.

CamGon457.First Lines:
I commande all the ratonys þat arn in this place withinne &
                    withoutand be þe wertu off oure swet lady þat jesu bar
                    abowte…
CamGon457.Last Lines:
…be the whiche this place ye kepe ffrom al wykkyd whehtisand
                    from all raonys & all odyr aventorysin nomine patrys & filij
                        & spiritus sancti amen
